name: 陳省三
objective:
金融科技是近年來新興的產業趨勢，影響的層面非常廣泛，不只是金融方面，更牽涉到法律方面。本課程將從不同的角度分析金融科技與專利、商標、著作權、營業秘密及之間的關係、應用領域及商業模式，並藉智慧財產權與國內外重要金融科技公司發展做一介紹，希望達到了解並運用此新興科技的目的。
FinTech is an emerging field. It will apply to many commercial fields. FinTech is not only in financial field, but also in legal field. This course will discuss the relationship between Finance, patent, copyright, trademark, trade secret and fair trading act. It also includes FinTech application and business model of famous FinTech companies. Case study is important in this course.
